Welcome to O.K Team Server :)

This is the backend for `O.K Team Server`. Below are the available API endpoints you can use.
For more details, see the documentation or contact the project maintainers.
  • Admin Panel
    /admin/
    Django admin interface for managing users, content, and settings.
  • Authentication API
    /api/v1/auth_api/
    Endpoints for registration, login, visitor sessions, email verification, and more.
  • User Management API
    /api/v1/user_mang/
    User profile, preferences, and related user operations.
  • Chat API
    /api/v1/chat_api/
    Chat and messaging endpoints for system users.
